Text.sc: 林间沼泽

Text.sc: 国王大厅

Text.sc: 图书馆

Text.jp: Sword-in-the-stone
Text.sc: 石中剑

Text.jp: Town
Text.sc: 城镇

Text.jp: King's guards
Text.sc: 国王卫兵

Text.jp: Cursed forest
Text.sc: 诅咒森林

Text.jp: Obelisk
Text.sc: 方尖塔

Text.jp: Complete all levels in the previous episode and collect 35 stars from it to open this episode.
Text.sc: 完成上一章所有关卡并收集35颗星即可解锁这一章。

Text.jp: Skip
Text.sc: 跳过

Text.jp: Store
Text.sc: 商店

Text.jp: These goods cost
Text.sc: 这些东西需要

Text.jp: You have only:
Text.sc: 你只有：

Text.jp: Clock Bonus.
Text.sc: 时钟奖励。

Text.jp: Level 1.\nBuy this item to increase each level's length by two steps.
Text.sc: 等级1.\n购买这件物品提升每一关的长度两步。

Text.jp: Level 2.\nBuy this item to increase each level's length by two steps.
Text.sc: 等级2.\n购买这件物品提升每一关的长度两步。

Text.jp: Level 3.\nBuy this item to increase each level's length by two steps.
Text.sc: 等级3.\n购买这件物品提升每一关的长度两步。

Text.jp: Level 4.\nBuy this item to increase each level's length by two steps.
Text.sc: 等级4.\n购买这件物品提升每一关的长度两步。

Text.jp: Level 5.\nBuy this item to increase each level's length by two steps.
Text.sc: 等级5.\n购买这件物品提升每一关的长度两步。

Text.jp: Level 5.\nEach level's length is increased by the maximum number of steps.
Text.sc: 等级5.\n每一关的长度被提升为最大值。

Text.jp: Lightning Bonus.
Text.sc: 闪电奖励。

Text.jp: Level 1.\nIncrease the number of crystals destroyed by 2 when this bonus is activated.
Text.sc: 等级1.\n激活此奖励提升2块被摧毁的水晶数量。

Text.jp: Level 2.\nIncrease the number of crystals destroyed by 2 when this bonus is activated.
Text.sc: 等级2.\n激活此奖励提升2块被摧毁的水晶数量。

Text.jp: Level 3.\nIncrease the number of crystals destroyed by 2 when this bonus is activated.
Text.sc: 等级3.\n激活此奖励提升2块被摧毁的水晶数量。

Text.jp: Level 4.\nIncrease the number of crystals destroyed by 2 when this bonus is activated.
Text.sc: 等级4.\n激活此奖励提升2块被摧毁的水晶数量。

Text.jp: Level 5.\nIncrease the number of crystals destroyed by 2 when this bonus is activated.
Text.sc: 等级5.\n激活此奖励提升2块被摧毁的水晶数量。

Text.jp: Level 5.\nWhen this bonus is activated, the maximum number of crystals is destroyed.
Text.sc: 等级5.\n激活此奖励提升被摧毁的水晶数量至最大值。

Text.jp: Chain Lightning Bonus.
Text.sc: 连锁闪电奖励。

Text.jp: Level 1.\nIncrease the number of crystals destroyed when this bonus is activated by 2.
Text.sc: 等级1.\n激活此奖励提升2块被摧毁的水晶数量。

Text.jp: Level 2.\nIncrease the number of crystals destroyed when this bonus is activated by 2.
Text.sc: 等级2.\n激活此奖励提升2块被摧毁的水晶数量。

Text.jp: Level 3.\nIncrease the number of crystals destroyed when this bonus is activated by 2.
Text.sc: 等级3.\n激活此奖励提升2块被摧毁的水晶数量。

Text.jp: Level 4.\nIncrease the number of crystals destroyed when this bonus is activated by 2.
Text.sc: 等级4.\n激活此奖励提升2块被摧毁的水晶数量。

Text.jp: Level 5.\nIncrease the number of crystals destroyed when this bonus is activated by 2.
Text.sc: 等级5.\n激活此奖励提升2块被摧毁的水晶数量。

Text.jp: Level 5.\nWhen this bonus is activated, the maximum number of crystals is destroyed.
Text.sc: 等级5.\n激活此奖励提升被摧毁的水晶数量至最大值。

Text.jp: Bomb Bonus.
Text.sc: 炸弹奖励。

Text.jp: Level 1.\nIncrease the number of crystals destroyed when this bonus is activated by 2.
Text.sc: 等级1.\n激活此奖励提升2块被摧毁的水晶数量。

Text.jp: Level 2.\nIncrease the number of crystals destroyed when this bonus is activated by 2.
Text.sc: 等级2.\n激活此奖励提升2块被摧毁的水晶数量。

Text.jp: Level 3.\nIncrease the number of crystals destroyed when this bonus is activated by 2.
Text.sc: 等级3.\n激活此奖励提升2块被摧毁的水晶数量。

Text.jp: Level 4.\nIncrease the number of crystals destroyed when this bonus is activated by 2.
Text.sc: 等级4.\n激活此奖励提升2块被摧毁的水晶数量。

Text.jp: Level 5.\nIncrease the number of crystals destroyed when this bonus is activated by 2.
Text.sc: 等级5.\n激活此奖励提升2块被摧毁的水晶数量。

Text.jp: Level 5.\nWhen this bonus is activated, the maximum number of crystals is destroyed.
Text.sc: 等级5.\n激活此奖励提升被摧毁的水晶数量至最大值。

Text.jp: Chain Bomb Bonus.
Text.sc: 连锁炸弹奖励。

Text.jp: Level 1.\nIncrease the number of crystals destroyed when this bonus is activated by 2.
Text.sc: 等级1.\n激活此奖励提升2块被摧毁的水晶数量。

Text.jp: Level 2.\nIncrease the number of crystals destroyed when this bonus is activated by 2.
Text.sc: 等级2.\n激活此奖励提升2块被摧毁的水晶数量。

Text.jp: Level 3.\nIncrease the number of crystals destroyed when this bonus is activated by 2.
Text.sc: 等级3.\n激活此奖励提升2块被摧毁的水晶数量。

Text.jp: Level 4.\nIncrease the number of crystals destroyed when this bonus is activated by 2.
Text.sc: 等级4.\n激活此奖励提升2块被摧毁的水晶数量。

Text.jp: Level 5.\nIncrease the number of crystals destroyed when this bonus is activated by 2.
Text.sc: 等级5.\n激活此奖励提升2块被摧毁的水晶数量。

Text.jp: Level 5.\nWhen this bonus is activated, the maximum number of crystals is destroyed.
Text.sc: 等级5.\n激活此奖励提升被摧毁的水晶数量至最大值。

Text.jp: Slot Machine.
Text.sc: 老虎机。

Text.jp: Level 1.\nDecrease the number of crystals of each color required to activate the Slot Machine by 2.
Text.sc: 等级1.\n降低激活老虎机时每种颜色需求的水晶2块。

Text.jp: Level 2.\nDecrease the number of crystals of each color required to activate the Slot Machine by 2.
Text.sc: 等级2.\n降低激活老虎机时每种颜色需求的水晶2块。

Text.jp: Level 3.\nDecrease the number of crystals of each color required to activate the Slot Machine by 2.
Text.sc: 等级3.\n降低激活老虎机时每种颜色需求的水晶2块。

Text.jp: Level 4.\nDecrease the number of crystals of each color required to activate the Slot Machine by 2.
Text.sc: 等级4.\n降低激活老虎机时每种颜色需求的水晶2块。

Text.jp: Level 5.\nDecrease the number of crystals of each color required to activate the Slot Machine by 2.
Text.sc: 等级5.\n降低激活老虎机时每种颜色需求的水晶2块。

Text.jp: Level 5.\nThe number of crystals of each color required to activate the Slot Machine is decreased by a maximum.
Text.sc: 等级5.\n激活老虎机时每种颜色需求的水晶数量已降至最低。

Text.jp: Lucky Clover.
Text.sc: 幸运草

Text.jp: Level 1.\n Increase the number of completed tasks by 1,25 for each Lucky Clover in the slot machine.
Text.sc: 等级1.\n提升老虎机里每颗幸运草完成的任务数量1.25

Text.jp: Level 2.\n Increase the number of completed tasks by 1,5 for each Lucky Clover in the slot machine.
Text.sc: 等级2.\n提升老虎机里每颗幸运草完成的任务数量1.5

Text.jp: Level 3.\n Increase the number of completed tasks by 1,75 for each Lucky Clover in the slot machine.
Text.sc: 等级3.\n提升老虎机里每颗幸运草完成的任务数量1.75

Text.jp: Level 4.\n Increase the number of completed tasks by 2 for each Lucky Clover in the slot machine.
Text.sc: 等级4.\n提升老虎机里每颗幸运草完成的任务数量2

Text.jp: Level 5.\n Increase the number of completed tasks by 2,5 for each Lucky Clover in the slot machine.
Text.sc: 等级5.\n提升老虎机里每颗幸运草完成的任务数量1.5

Text.jp: Level 5.\n Increase the number of completed tasks by 2,5 for each Lucky Clover in the slot machine.
Text.sc: 等级5.\n提升老虎机里每颗幸运草完成的任务数量1.5

Text.jp: Restart
Text.sc: 重新开始

Text.jp: Main menu
Text.sc: 主菜单

Text.jp: Continue
Text.sc: 继续

Text.jp: Buy
Text.sc: 购买

Text.jp: Points:
Text.sc: 点数：

Text.jp: Tasks completed:
Text.sc: 完成任务：

Text.jp: Level
Text.sc: 关卡

Text.jp: Collect all gems on the field.
Text.sc: 收集台面上的所有宝石。

Text.jp: You need to collect sapphires and emeralds.
Text.sc: 你需要收集蓝宝石与绿宝石。

Text.jp: Now collect rubies and topazes! You need more of these than before.
Text.sc: 现在收集红宝石与黄宝石！多多益善。

Text.jp: Collect any gems, but remember some of these should be emeralds.
Text.sc: 随意收集宝石，但记住其中有一部分必须是绿宝石。

Text.jp: Lines can form squares, and four squares activate the Bomb Bonus.
Text.sc: 线条组成方块，四个方块可以激活炸弹奖励。

Text.jp: Form squares from any gems.
Text.sc: 使用任意宝石组成方块。

Text.jp: If a line forms a Z, four Zs activate a new bonus: the Chain Bomb.
Text.sc: 线条也能组成Z形，四个Z可以激活新奖励：连锁炸弹。

Text.jp: Collect emeralds and activate bombs.
Text.sc: 收集绿宝石激活炸弹。

Text.jp: Lines of 4 give you the Lightning Bonus.
Text.sc: 4条线可激活闪电奖励。

Text.jp: Your task: sapphires and Z-shapes.
Text.sc: 你的目标：蓝宝石与Z形。

Text.jp: Four chains that form an L give you the Chain Lightning Bonus.
Text.sc: 四个L形相连可激活连锁闪电奖励。

Text.jp: Collect topazes and activate chain bombs.
Text.sc: 收集黄宝石激活连锁炸弹。

Text.jp: Create any shapes and activate any bombs.
Text.sc: 创造任意形状激活任意炸弹。

Text.jp: Collect the required number of points and shapes.
Text.sc: 收集所需的点数与形状。

Text.jp: Your task: sapphires and topaz crystals.
Text.sc: 你的目标：蓝宝石与黄宝石水晶。

Text.jp: Activate bombs and turn the slot machine on.
Text.sc: 激活炸弹并开启老虎机。

Text.jp: Collect points and any gems.
Text.sc: 收集点数与任意宝石。

Text.jp: Lightning will help you to collect emeralds.
Text.sc: 闪电会帮助你收集绿宝石。

Text.jp: You need to collect rubies and Z-shapes.
Text.sc: 你需要收集红宝石与Z形。

Text.jp: Emeralds and chain bombs are an explosive mixture indeed!
Text.sc: 绿宝石与连锁炸弹的组合当然是“爆炸性”的！

Text.jp: Collect L-shapes and points on time.
Text.sc: 及时收集L形与点数。

Text.jp: Activate any bonuses by collecting rubies.
Text.sc: 收集红宝石激活任意奖励。

Text.jp: Collect lines and sapphires.
Text.sc: 收集线条与蓝宝石。

Text.jp: You need to collect emeralds and bombs.
Text.sc: 你需要收集绿宝石与炸弹。

Text.jp: You need to collect topazes and square shapes.
Text.sc: 你需要收集黄宝石与方形。

Text.jp: Create any shapes and activate chain bombs.
Text.sc: 创造任意形状激活连锁炸弹。

Text.jp: You need to collect the required number of gems and points on time.
Text.sc: 你需要及时收集足够的宝石与点数。

Text.jp: Your task: sapphires and any bonuses.
Text.sc: 你的目标：蓝宝石与任意奖励。

Text.jp: Activate chain lightning by collecting L-shapes.
Text.sc: 收集L形激活连锁闪电。

Text.jp: Bombs were always useful in collecting emeralds, weren't they?
Text.sc: 炸弹真是绿宝石收集利器呀。

Text.jp: Z-shapes will help you activate the slot machine.
Text.sc: Z形会帮助你激活老虎机。

Text.jp: Collect topazes and activate chain lightning.
Text.sc: 收集黄宝石激活连锁闪电。

Text.jp: Freedom: any gems, any shapes.
Text.sc: 自由：任意宝石，任意形状。

Text.jp: Create lines and collect points on time.
Text.sc: 及时创造线条并收集点数。

Text.jp: Red rubies and cold chain lightning go really well together.
Text.sc: 红宝石与冰冻连锁闪电相得益彰。

Text.jp: You need to collect emeralds and L-shapes to complete the level.
Text.sc: 你需要收集绿宝石与L形才能过关。

Text.jp: Collect topazes and activate lightning.
Text.sc: 收集黄宝石并激活闪电。

Text.jp: Chain bombs can be made with Z-shapes.
Text.sc: 连锁炸弹可由Z形激活。

Text.jp: Create squares and activate any bonuses.
Text.sc: 创造方块并激活任意奖励。

Text.jp: You need to collect the required number of points on time.
Text.sc: 你需要及时收集足够的点数。

Text.jp: On this level, create L-shapes and activate the slot machine.
Text.sc: 在这关，创造L形并激活老虎机。

Text.jp: Activate any bonuses by collecting rubies.
Text.sc: 收集红宝石激活任意奖励。

Text.jp: Collect lines, sapphires and bombs.
Text.sc: 收集线条、蓝宝石与炸弹。

Text.jp: Z-shapes and emeralds look nice together.
Text.sc: Z形与绿宝石搭配在一起更漂亮。

Text.jp: You need to collect topazes and square shapes, and activate the lightning.
Text.sc: 你需要收集黄宝石与方形，并激活闪电。

Text.jp: Create any shapes, activate chain bombs and the slot machine.
Text.sc: 创造任意形状，激活连锁炸弹与老虎机。

Text.jp: You need to collect the required number of points, gems and lines on time.
Text.sc: 你需要及时收集足够的点数、宝石与线条。

Text.jp: Your task: sapphires and any bonuses.
Text.sc: 你的目标：蓝宝石与任意奖励。

Text.jp: Activate chain lightning by collecting L-shapes and rubies.
Text.sc: 收集L形与红宝石激活连锁闪电。

Text.jp: Bombs are always useful for mining emeralds.
Text.sc: 炸弹在开采绿宝石时很有用。

Text.jp: Z-shapes will help you activate the slot machine.
Text.sc: Z形会帮助你激活老虎机。

Text.jp: To activate the slot machine, you only need Z-shapes and lightning.
Text.sc: 你需要Z形与闪电才能激活老虎机。

Text.jp: Freedom: any gems, any shapes, any bonuses.
Text.sc: 自由：任意宝石、形状与奖励。

Text.jp: Collect sapphires, lines and points on time.
Text.sc: 及时收集蓝宝石、线条与点数。

Text.jp: Red rubies and cold chain lightning go really well together.
Text.sc: 红宝石与冰冻连锁闪电相得益彰。

Text.jp: You need to collect emeralds, L-shapes and bombs to complete the level.
Text.sc: 你需要收集绿宝石、L形与炸弹才能过关。

Text.jp: Activate lightning and collect topazes.
Text.sc: 激活闪电并收集黄宝石。

Text.jp: Your task: activate the slot machine and chain bombs, and create Z-shapes.
Text.sc: 你的目标：激活老虎机与连锁炸弹，并创造Z形。

Text.jp: Activate any bonuses and create squares.
Text.sc: 激活任意奖励并创造方块。

Text.jp: Collect the required number of points, gems and shapes on time.
Text.sc: 及时收集所需的点数、宝石与形状。

Text.jp: Collect rubies, L-shapes and chain lightning.
Text.sc: 收集红宝石、L形与连锁闪电。

Text.jp: Activate any bonuses by collecting sapphires.
Text.sc: 收集蓝宝石激活任意奖励。

Text.jp: Collect points, lines and any gems on time.
Text.sc: 及时收集点数、线条与任意宝石。

Text.jp: Your task: emeralds and bombs.
Text.sc: 你的目标：绿宝石与炸弹。

Text.jp: Activate the slot machine; lightning and Z-shapes will help.
Text.sc: 激活老虎机；闪电与Z形可以帮助你。

Text.jp: You need to collect topazes, square shapes and chain bombs.
Text.sc: 你需要激活黄宝石、方形与连锁炸弹。

Text.jp: You need to collect the required number of points and L-shapes on time.
Text.sc: 你需要及时收集所需的点数与L形。

Text.jp: Collect rubies and any bonuses.
Text.sc: 收集红宝石与任意奖励。

Text.jp: Your task: sapphires, lines and bombs.
Text.sc: 你的目标：蓝宝石、线条与炸弹。

Text.jp: You need to collect emeralds and Z-shapes.
Text.sc: 你需要收集绿宝石与Z形。

Text.jp: You need to collect topazes and square shapes, and activate the lightning.
Text.sc: 你需要收集黄宝石与方形，并激活闪电。

Text.jp: Activate the slot machine and chain bombs, and collect any shapes.
Text.sc: 激活老虎机与连锁炸弹，并收集任意形状。

Text.jp: Your task: any gems, any shapes, any bonuses.
Text.sc: 你的目标：任意宝石、形状与奖励。

Text.jp: Collect sapphires, lines and points on time.
Text.sc: 及时收集蓝宝石、线条与点数。

Text.jp: Rubies and chain lightning are your goals for this level.
Text.sc: 这关的目标是红宝石与连锁闪电。

Text.jp: You need to collect emeralds, L-shapes and bombs to complete the level.
Text.sc: 你需要收集绿宝石、L形与炸弹才能过关。

Text.jp: Collect topazes and activate lightning.
Text.sc: 收集黄宝石并激活闪电。

Text.jp: Your task: activate the slot machine and chain bombs, and create Z-shapes.
Text.sc: 你的目标：激活老虎机与连锁炸弹，并创造Z形。

Text.jp: Activate any bonuses and create squares.
Text.sc: 激活任意奖励并创造方块。

Text.jp: Collect the required number of points, gems and shapes on time.
Text.sc: 及时收集所需的点数、宝石与形状。

Text.jp: Create L-shapes and activate the slot machine on this level.
Text.sc: 在这关创造L形并激活老虎机。

Text.jp: Activate any bonuses by collecting rubies.
Text.sc: 收集红宝石激活任意奖励。

Text.jp: Collect lines, sapphires and bombs.
Text.sc: 收集线条、蓝宝石与炸弹。

Text.jp: Emeralds and Z-shapes look nice together.
Text.sc: 绿宝石与连锁炸弹的组合当然是“爆炸性”的！

Text.sc: 你需要收集黄宝石与方形，并激活闪电。

Text.jp: Create any shapes, activate chain bombs and the slot machine.
Text.sc: 创造任意形状，激活连锁炸弹与老虎机。

Text.jp: Collect the required number of points, gems and shapes on time.
Text.sc: 及时收集所需的点数、宝石与形状。

Text.jp: Your task: sapphires and any bonuses.
Text.sc: 你的目标：蓝宝石与任意奖励。

Text.jp: Activate chain lightning by collecting L-shapes and rubies.
Text.sc: 收集L形与红宝石激活连锁闪电。

Text.jp: Bombs were always useful in mining emeralds.
Text.sc: 炸弹在开采绿宝石时很有用。

Text.jp: Z-shapes will help you activate the slot machine.
Text.sc: Z形会帮助你激活老虎机。

Text.jp: To activate the slot machine, you only need Z-shapes and lightning.
Text.sc: 你需要Z形与闪电才能激活老虎机。

Text.jp: Freedom: any gems, any shapes, any bonuses.
Text.sc: 自由：任意宝石、形状与奖励。

Text.jp: Collect sapphires, lines and points on time.
Text.sc: 及时收集蓝宝石、线条与点数。

Text.jp: Red rubies and cold chain lightning go really well together.
Text.sc: 红宝石与冰冻连锁闪电相得益彰。

Text.jp: You need to collect emeralds, L-shapes and bombs to complete the level.
Text.sc: 你需要收集绿宝石、L形与炸弹才能过关。

Text.jp: Activate lightning and collect topazes.
Text.sc: 激活闪电并收集黄宝石。

Text.jp: Your task: activate the slot machine and chain bombs, and create Z-shapes.
Text.sc: 你的目标：激活老虎机与连锁炸弹，并创造Z形。

Text.jp: Activate any bonuses and create squares.
Text.sc: 激活任意奖励并创造方块。

Text.jp: Collect the required number of points, gems and shapes on time.
Text.sc: 及时收集所需的点数、宝石与形状。

Text.jp: Collect rubies, L-shapes and chain lightning.
Text.sc: 收集红宝石、L形与连锁闪电。

Text.jp: Activate any bonuses by collecting sapphires.
Text.sc: 收集蓝宝石激活任意奖励。

Text.jp: Collect the required number of points, gems and shapes on time.
Text.sc: 及时收集所需的点数、宝石与形状。

Text.jp: Your task: emeralds and bombs.
Text.sc: 你的目标：绿宝石与炸弹。

Text.jp: Activate the slot machine; lightning and Z-shapes will help.
Text.sc: 激活老虎机；闪电与Z形可以帮助你。

Text.jp: You need to collect topazes, square shapes and chain bombs.
Text.sc: 你需要激活黄宝石、方形与连锁炸弹。

Text.jp: Collect the required number of points and L-shapes on time.
Text.sc: 及时获得足够的点数与L形。

Text.jp: Collect rubies and any bonuses.
Text.sc: 收集红宝石与任意奖励。

Text.jp: Your task: sapphires, lines and bombs.
Text.sc: 你的目标：蓝宝石、线条与炸弹。

Text.jp: You need to collect emeralds and Z-shapes.
Text.sc: 你需要收集绿宝石与Z形。

Text.jp: You need to collect topazes and square shapes, and activate the lightning.
Text.sc: 你需要收集黄宝石与方形，并激活闪电。

Text.jp: Activate the slot machine and chain bombs, and collect any shapes.
Text.sc: 激活老虎机与连锁炸弹，并收集任意形状。

Text.jp: You need to collect any stones, shapes and bonuses.
Text.sc: 你需要收集任意石头、形状与奖励。

Text.jp: Collect sapphires, lines and points on time.
Text.sc: 及时收集蓝宝石、线条与点数。

Text.jp: Rubies and chain lightning are your goals for this level.
Text.sc: 这关的目标是红宝石与连锁闪电。

Text.jp: Collect emeralds, L-shapes and bombs to complete this level.
Text.sc: 收集绿宝石、L形与炸弹才能过关。

Text.jp: Collect topazes and activate lightning.
Text.sc: 收集黄宝石并激活闪电。

Text.jp: Your task: activate the slot machine and chain bombs, and create Z-shapes.
Text.sc: 你的目标：激活老虎机与连锁炸弹，并创造Z形。

Text.jp: Activate any bonuses and create squares.
Text.sc: 激活任意奖励并创造方块。

Text.jp: Collect the required number of points, gems and shapes on time.
Text.sc: 及时收集所需的点数、宝石与形状。

Text.jp: On this level, create L-shapes and activate the slot machine.
Text.sc: 在这关，创造L形并激活老虎机。

Text.jp: Activate any bonuses by collecting rubies.
Text.sc: 收集红宝石激活任意奖励。

Text.jp: Collect lines, sapphires and bombs.
Text.sc: 收集线条、蓝宝石与炸弹。

Text.jp: Emeralds and Z-shapes look nice together.
Text.sc: 绿宝石与连锁炸弹的组合当然是“爆炸性”的！

Text.jp: You need to collect topazes and square shapes, and activate the lightning.
Text.sc: 你需要收集黄宝石与方形，并激活闪电。

Text.jp: Collect any shapes, activate the chain bombs and the slot machine.
Text.sc: 收集任意形状，激活连锁炸弹与老虎机。

Text.jp: You need to collect the required number of points, gems and lines on time.
Text.sc: 你需要及时收集足够的点数、宝石与线条。

Text.jp: Your task: sapphires and any bonuses.
Text.sc: 你的目标：蓝宝石与任意奖励。

Text.jp: Activate chain lightning by collecting L-shapes and rubies.
Text.sc: 收集L形与红宝石激活连锁闪电。

Text.jp: Bombs were always useful in mining emeralds.
Text.sc: 炸弹在开采绿宝石时很有用。

Text.jp: Z-shapes will help you activate the slot machine.
Text.sc: Z形会帮助你激活老虎机。

Text.jp: To activate the slot machine, you only need Z-shapes and lightning.
Text.sc: 你需要Z形与闪电才能激活老虎机。

Text.jp: Freedom: any gems, any shapes, any bonuses.
Text.sc: 自由：任意宝石、形状与奖励。

Text.jp: Collect sapphires, lines and points on time.
Text.sc: 及时收集蓝宝石、线条与点数。

Text.jp: Red rubies and cold chain lightning go really well together.
Text.sc: 红宝石与冰冻连锁闪电相得益彰。

Text.sc: 激活闪电并收集黄宝石。

Text.sc: 激活任意奖励并创造方块。

Text.sc: 及时收集所需的点数、宝石与形状。

Text.sc: 收集红宝石、L形与连锁闪电。

Text.sc: 收集蓝宝石激活任意奖励。

Text.jp: Collect points, lines and any gems on time.
Text.sc: 及时收集点数、线条与任意宝石。

Text.sc: 你的目标：绿宝石与炸弹。

Text.sc: 激活老虎机；闪电与Z形可以帮助你。

Text.sc: 收集红宝石与任意奖励。

Text.sc: 你需要收集绿宝石与Z形。

Text.jp: You need to collect topazes and square shapes, and activate the lightning.
Text.sc: 你需要收集黄宝石与方形，并激活闪电。

Text.jp: Activate the slot machine and chain bombs, and collect any shapes.
Text.sc: 激活老虎机与连锁炸弹，并收集任意形状。

Text.sc: 你的目标：任意宝石、形状与奖励。

Text.jp: Collect sapphires, lines and points on time.
Text.sc: 及时收集蓝宝石、线条与点数。

Text.sc: 这关的目标是红宝石与连锁闪电。

Text.jp: Collect emeralds, L-shapes and bombs to complete this level.
Text.sc: 收集绿宝石、L形与炸弹才能过关。

Text.sc: 收集黄宝石并激活闪电。

Text.jp: Your task: activate the slot machine and chain bombs, and create Z-shapes.
Text.sc: 你的目标：激活老虎机与连锁炸弹，并创造Z形。

Text.jp: You've got:
Text.sc: 你得到：

Text.jp: You win!
Text.sc: 你赢了！

Text.jp: Defeat
Text.sc: 失败

Text.jp: Buy
Text.sc: 购买

Text.jp: Prize slot
Text.sc: 奖品栏

Text.jp: Menu
Text.sc: 菜单

Text.jp: Go!
Text.sc: Go!

Text.jp: No more turns left.
Text.sc: 回合已用完。

Text.jp: Time is up.
Text.sc: 时间到。

Text.jp: All tasks are completed.
Text.sc: 所有目标已达成。

Text.jp: Tutorial
Text.sc: 教程

Text.jp: Turn
Text.sc: 回合

Text.jp: To destroy gems, select three or more gems of the same color.
Text.sc: 选中相同颜色的三颗或更多宝石，就可以摧毁它们。

Text.jp: The goal of each level is to complete the task shown to the side.
Text.sc: 每关的目标显示在屏幕边上。

Text.jp: A certain number of turns, or a certain amount of time, is given to complete these tasks.
Text.sc: 你要在限定回合或时间内完成这些目标。

Text.jp: By forming shapes with the gems, you charge bonuses. These help you to destroy gems on the field.
Text.sc: 为宝石勾勒出形状可使你获得奖励，这些奖励非常有用。

Text.jp: To obtain a bonus, collect 4 shapes of the same type.
Text.sc: 收集同类宝石的4种形状即可获得奖励。

Text.jp: To activate a bonus, include it in a chain of any color.
Text.sc: 将奖励包含在任意颜色的连接里即可激活它。

Text.jp: Collect the gems on the field and run the slot machine to win prizes.
Text.sc: 收集台面上的宝石并使用老虎机，获得奖品。

Text.jp: Each icon you get gives you a prize. The more icons of the same type you get, the better the prize!
Text.sc: 每个图标都能为你带来奖品。图标越多，奖品越好！

Text.jp: You can substantially increase your prizes by buying an additional slot in the slot machine.
Text.sc: 在老虎机里购买额外的空槽可以极大地提升你得到的奖品。

Text.jp: In this menu you can improve the game bonuses and other components of the game.
Text.sc: 在这个菜单，你可以提升游戏里的奖励与其它内容。

Text.jp: No more turns.
Text.sc: 回合已用完。

Text.jp: Guest
Text.sc: 访客

Text.jp: Pause
Text.sc: 暂停

Text.jp: Click to continue...
Text.sc: 单击继续

Text.jp: Profiles
Text.sc: 档案

Text.jp: Delete the profile?
Text.sc: 删除档案？

Text.jp: Click to create a new profile.
Text.sc: 单击创建新档案。

Text.jp: Enter a name:
Text.sc: 输入名字：

Text.jp: This item is fully upgraded.
Text.sc: 该项目已升满。
